parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the WAF instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: OwnerUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the resource belongs.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the WAF instance is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceDomain
parameters.description: The domain name. You can use this parameter if you set ResourceProduct to fc or sae.

parameters.name: ResourceFunction
parameters.description: The function name. You can use this parameter if you set ResourceProduct to fc.

parameters.name: ResourceInstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the instance that is added to WAF.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceProduct
parameters.description:
The cloud service to which the resource belongs. If you do not specify this parameter, the system automatically returns the Application Load Balancer (ALB), Microservices Engine (MSE), Function Compute, and Serverless App Engine (SAE) resources that are added to WAF. Valid values:

*   **alb**: ALB.
*   **mse**: MSE.
*   **fc**: Function Compute.
*   **sae**: SAE.
*   **ecs**: Elastic Compute Service (ECS).
*   **clb4**: Layer 4 Classic Load Balancer (CLB).
*   **clb7**: Layer 7 CLB.
*   **nlb**: Network Load Balancer (NLB).

>  Different cloud services are available in different regions. The specified cloud service must be available in the specified region.

parameters.name: ResourceRegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the resource. For information about region IDs, see the following table.

>  Different cloud services are available in different regions. The specified cloud service must be available in the specified region.

parameters.name: ResourceRouteName
parameters.description: The route name. You can use this parameter if you set ResourceProduct to mse.
